description: The name of our company is ‚ÄòExplore Toronto Free Tours‚Äô and our free tour starts at 10am from College Park. Is the best city introduction you can have in Canada‚Äôs largest city. This is 3 hours walking tour in the downtown core of Toronto. This free tour is based on tips. If you did the free tour with us ‚ÄòExplore Toronto Free Tours‚Äô kindly leave us a review for feedback. Thank you!

reviews.title: Great tour guide, would highly recommend!!
text: Jose was really friendly, welcoming and knowledgeable! He made the tour very interesting, full of information and recommendation, and he answered all our questions! The route was very well thought out, with the right balance of history and modern things. I feel like we saw a good portion of Toronto, I liked the printed photos he held too, to help show was Toronto was like at different parts. I would highly recommend! üòÅ

reviews.title: A very recommended tour in Toronto
text: Jose was an incredible guide. He explained the main buildings of the city in a very interesting way and additionally he provided us with some useful information about the city and it's attractions and bars.
I would surely recommend it to anyone that comes to Toronto and wants to have a general idea of the city in their first days.

reviews.title: A delightful time
text: Enjoyed it quite a bit. Gave us a wonderful overview of the city . Covered its past and showed us the nifty downtown core too.

reviews.title: Excellent
text: Beautiful experience, the tour guide was very kind and he tries to help  as much as he could by giving important information.

reviews.title: A very fascinating tour of Toronto
text: Jose was a fantastic tour guide and provided a lot of fascinating info about Toronto. He also provided good recommendations on places to visit as well as bars and restaurants.

reviews.title: A beautiful and unforgettable experience.
text: Jose is really a excellent and knowledgeable tour guide. He shared lots of information about the Toronto with good communication skills. I really enjoyed his tour throughout the journey. He is very nice and humble guy. He gave his umbrella to the tourists when it was raining and was very supportive to everyone during the tour. I really recommend him to go for tour with him.

reviews.title: Amazing walking tour
text: Jose is an excellent tour guide, the walking tour was informative, enjoyable & a great workout even on windy winter day!

reviews.title: Amazing tour
text: The tour guide was very enthusiastic and provided a lot of up to date information.  You will receive surprising gifts at the end of the tour.

reviews.title: Toronto walking tour
text: Though it was very cold, I absolutely enjoyed the atmosphere! It's nice to get some information and tips especially if you just arrived. Absolutely recommended.

reviews.title: Trip
text: Best Tour guide I ever had

This tour was incredible and I really enjoyed it. The way the tour was structured was excellent, and the information was not only informative, but also was in depth and complementary for traveling in the Toronto. However, what really impressed me was the tour guide Jose, he was very close, and the job suits him perfectly. I would completely recommend this tour, with special emphasis in choosing Jose as guide.
